lead_paragraph: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini had words of warning for defenders facing Sergio Aguero in the second half of the Premier League season -- he is just going to keep getting better.

headline.print_headline: Aguero Will Be Back to His Best in Run-In-Pellegrini
headline.main: Aguero Will Be Back to His Best in Run-In-Pellegrini

snippet: Manchester City manager Manuel Pellegrini had words of warning for defenders facing Sergio Aguero in the second half of the Premier League season -- he is just going to keep getting better....
